name: Play Solitaire Card Game
description:
********************
Solitaire Game
********************
Solitaire is the #1 Solitaire card game on iOS now available.
If you love Windows Solitaire, you're going to love Classic Solitaire+ even more!
Solitaire is from the makers of one of the most popular solitaire card games on the iTunes App Store for iPhone & iPad.

If you love solitaire, spider solitaire, freecell, or any other patience card games, don't miss out on the best solitaire for your iPad!

Just give the game a try, and we promise Solitaire by This app is the most beautiful and user friendly solitaire game you've played before

FEATURES:

* 6 variations of Klondike
* Klondike Solitaire Draw 1 card
* Klondike Solitaire Draw 3 cards
* Game Statistics
* Vegas scoring
* Custom themes from your own photos
* Rotate the device during play to switch orientation
* Impressive graphical effects
*Timed scoring system
* Local leaderboards and statistics
* Listen to iTunes music while playing
* Fun sound effects and sound themes
* Interactive training
* Unlimited undos
* Saves game position when the phone rings
* Left and right handed options
* Serious addiction
* Portrait and Landscape
